Row.Text: [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages last 50% longer. During a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, Units receive +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and a +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus. Militaristic City-States grant units twice as often when you are at war with a common foe.
